alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:08PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elko County through 530 PM PDT... At 507 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles southwest of West Wendover, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and create areas of blowing dust. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Elko County, including the Goshute fire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
